snippet: A Chechen man on trial for the murder of the journalist and government critic Anna Politkovskaya was shot in the leg, his lawyer said on Friday, calling it an attempt to silence him.
abstract: Lawyer for Dzhabrail Makhmudov, Chechen man on trial in Moscow for the murder of the journalist and government critic Anna Politkovskaya, says his client was shot in the leg, calling it an attempt to silence him.
lead_paragraph: A Chechen man on trial for the murder of the journalist and government critic Anna Politkovskaya was shot in the leg, his lawyer said on Friday, calling it an attempt to silence him.

headline.main: Russia: Chechen Man on Trial in Killing Of Journalist Is Shot on Moscow Street
headline.print_headline: Russia: Chechen Man on Trial in Killing Of Journalist Is Shot on Moscow Street
